Ease_Time_Enter.description: transition time at the time of invasion (sec) ※ use only events

Ease_Time_Leave.description: transition time at the time of withdrawal (sec) ※ use only events

EyePathType.description: camera moving method on the path

PanAndTangentBlend.description: target direction and the path direction of interpolation rate

TargetOffset_Right.description: offset left and right of the target coordinate system

TargetOffset_Up.description: offset the top and bottom of the target coordinate system

TargetOffset_Front.description: before and after the offset of the target coordinate system
